00019 #if defined(__MINGW32__)
00020 typedef HANDLE sem_t;
00021 typedef DWORD timeout_t;
00022 #  define MAX_SEM_VALUE 1000000
00023 #else
00024 typedef unsigned long timeout_t;
00025 #  ifdef HAVE_SEMAPHORE_H
00026 #     include <semaphore.h>
00027 //    -------------------------------------------------------------
00028 //    check for broken implementation on Linux (debian)...
00029 //    -------------------------------------------------------------
00030 #     if defined(LINUX) || defined(__LINUX__) || defined(__linux__)
00031 #        include <linux/version.h>
00032 #        ifndef KERNEL_VERSION
00033 #           define KERNEL_VERSION(a,b,c) (((a) << 16) + ((b) << 8) + (c))
00034 #        endif
00035 #        ifndef LINUX_VERSION_CODE
00036 #           error "You need to use at least 2.0 Linux kernel."
00037 #        endif
00038 #        if LINUX_VERSION_CODE < KERNEL_VERSION(2,6,7)
00039 #           define U_MAYBE_BROKEN_SEM_IMPL
00040 #        endif
00041 #     endif
00042 //    -------------------------------------------------------------
00043 #  else
00044 /*
00045 typedef int sem_t;
00046 extern "C" {
00047 extern int sem_wait(sem_t*__sem);
00048 extern int sem_post(sem_t* __sem);
00049 extern int sem_destroy(sem_t* __sem);
00050 extern int sem_init(sem_t* __sem, int __pshared, unsigned int __value):
00051 }
00052 */
00053 #  endif
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #if !defined(HAVE_SEMAPHORE_H) || defined(U_MAYBE_BROKEN_SEM_IMPL) // _LIBC // uClib
00057 #  ifdef _POSIX_THREAD_PROCESS_SHARED
00058 #     ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00059 #        include <pthread.h>
00060 #     else
00061 //    -------------------------------------------------------------
00062 extern "C" {
00063 extern int pthread_mutex_lock(pthread_mutex_t* mutex);
00064 extern int pthread_mutex_unlock(pthread_mutex_t* mutex);
00065 extern int pthread_mutex_destroy(pthread_mutex_t* mutex);
00066 extern int pthread_mutexattr_init(pthread_mutexattr_t* mutex_attr);
00067 extern int pthread_mutex_init(pthread_mutex_t* mutex, const pthread_mutexattr_t* mutex_attr); }
00068 #     endif
00069 #  else
00070 #     define U_LOCKFILE
00071 #     undef  U_MAYBE_BROKEN_SEM_IMPL
00072 #  endif
00073 #endif

00075 #ifdef U_LOCKFILE
00076 #  include <ulib/file.h>
00077 #endif
00078 
00089 class U_EXPORT USemaphore {
00090 public:
00091 
00092         // Check for memory error
00093         U_MEMORY_TEST
00094 
00095         // Allocator e Deallocator
00096         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00097         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00098 
00099         USemaphore()
00100                 {
00101                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USemaphore, "", 0)
00102                 }
00103 
00111         void init(sem_t* ptr = 0, unsigned resource = 1);
00112 
00118         ~USemaphore();
00119 
00129         bool wait(timeout_t timeout);
00130 
00131         void lock() { (void) wait(0); }
00132 
00140         void post();
00141 
00142         void unlock() { post(); }
00143 
00144 #ifdef DEBUG
00145         const char* dump(bool) const;
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 protected:
00149 #if defined(__MINGW32__)
00150         HANDLE sem;
00151 #elif defined(U_LOCKFILE)
00152         UFile tmp;
00153 #else
00154         sem_t* sem;
00155 #       if defined(U_MAYBE_BROKEN_SEM_IMPL)
00156         pthread_mutex_t     mutex;
00157         pthread_mutexattr_t mutex_attr;
00158 #       endif
00159         bool flag, broken;
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 #if !defined(__MINGW32__) && defined(DEBUG)
00163 #  if defined(U_LOCKFILE) || defined(U_MAYBE_BROKEN_SEM_IMPL)
00164         int getValue() { return -1; }
00165 #  else
00166         int getValue() { int value; sem_getvalue(sem, &value); return value; }
00167 #  endif
00168 #endif
00169 
00170 private:
00171         USemaphore(const USemaphore&)            {}
00172         USemaphore& operator=(const USemaphore&) { return *this; }
00173 };

00175 #endif
